response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special price. My proposal is to offer this remarkable item to you for $950,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality product at a price that is significantly below its market value. I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 950000}
